summary: The Forbidden pool and caves as seen in Lord of the rings movies. New weapons. New Follower
descriptionHtml:
The Forbidden pool and caves as seen in Lord of the rings movies.

New weapons. 

New Follower.

New Npc\'s.

Please Endorse. Please put up photos.
